mapper.select: SELECT CNO, CONTENTID, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, USERNAME as writerNM, nvl((select count(*) from review r where r.WRITER = m.userno),0) as "reviewCnt", PROFILEPIC, GRADE FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER M ON (WRITER = USERNO) WHERE CONTENTID = #{contentid} ORDER BY CNO DESC
SELECT CNO, CONTENTID, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, USERNAME as writerNM, PROFILEPIC, GRADE, CONTENTTYPEID FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER M ON (WRITER = USERNO) WHERE WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY CNO DESC
